## IContainer.disposeAsync() method

Asynchronously disposes all resolved, internally owned instances registered using [Disposer](./typeioc.disposer.md) interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
disposeAsync(): Promise<void>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

`Promise<void>`

- promise
